jpcap.packet
Class Packet

java.lang.Object
  jpcap.packet.Packet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ARPPacket, IPPacket
public class Packet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This is a root class of the all the packets captured by Jpcap.

See Also:
